org.deeplearning4j.text.corpora.treeparser

Class TreeVectorizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.text.corpora.treeparser.TreeVectorizer

  • public class TreeVectorizer
extends Object
    Tree vectorization pipeline. Takes a word vector model (as a lookup table) and a parser and handles vectorization of strings appropriate for an RNTN
    Author:
    Adam Gibson

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TreeVectorizer()
      Uses word vectors from the passed in word2vec model
      TreeVectorizer(TreeParser parser)
      Uses the given parser and model for vectorization of strings

    • Method Detail

      • getTrees

        public List<Tree> getTrees(String sentences)
                    throws Exception
        Vectorizes the passed in sentences
        Parameters:
        sentences - the sentences to convert to trees
        Returns:
        a list of trees pre converted with CNF and binarized and word vectors at the leaves of the trees
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getTreesWithLabels

        public List<Tree> getTreesWithLabels(String sentences,
                                     String label,
                                     List<String> labels)
                              throws Exception
        Vectorizes the passed in sentences
        Parameters:
        sentences - the sentences to convert to trees
        label - the label for the sentence
        labels - all of the possible labels for the trees
        Returns:
        a list of trees pre converted with CNF and binarized and word vectors at the leaves of the trees
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getTreesWithLabels

                              throws Exception

        Parameters:

        labels - all of the possible labels for the trees
